ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ISEE 1 LEPEDEA Ion and Electron Spectrograms

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set consists of a set of daily files with GIF-formatted spectrograms displaying color coded ion flux levels as functions of time and of energy level, in each of 4 look-direction quadrants, over the energy range of ~150 eV/q to 45 keV/q. Also displayed is a single omni-directional spectrogram for electrons in the same energy range. ISEE position data is listed once every every four hours across the time axis.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the ISEE/LEPEDEA team at U. Iowa, L.A. Frank, Principal Investigator
